SEARCH
Package wt.bookstore.backend.mapping

Class DtoMapper

java.lang.Object
wt.bookstore.backend.mapping.DtoMapper
public class DtoMapper extends Object
This class contains all the methods needed to map a DTO to an entity or an entity to an DTO for all the entities and all the DTO's

  • Method Details

    • dtoToLoan

      public static Loan dtoToLoan(SaveLoanDto saveLoanDto, IUserRepository userRepository, ICopyRepository copyRepository)
      Method that transforms a DTO from a post request to an object that can be used for a database
      Parameters:
      saveLoanDto - (SaveLoanDto) DTO to be transformed to an object
      userRepository - (IUserRepository) Access to User database necessary to check if userdata in DTO is valid
      copyRepository - (ICopyRepository) Access to Copy database necessary to check if copydata in DTO is valid
      Returns:
      loan (Loan) object that can serve as entity for a database

    • dtoToReservation

      public static Reservation dtoToReservation(SaveReservationDto saveReservationDto, IUserRepository userRepository, IBookRepository bookRepository)
      Method that transforms a DTO from a post request to an object that can be used for a database
      Parameters:
      saveReservationDto - (SaveReservationDto) DTO to be transformed to an object
      userRepository - (IUserRepository) Access to User database necessary to check if userdata in DTO is valid
      bookRepository - (IBookRepository) Access to Book database necessary to check if bookdata in DTO is valid
      Returns:
      reservation (Reservation) object that can serve as entity for a database
